justification: Vendor 2 states 'enables customizable, real-time reporting' and 'aggregate telemetry and digital twin data into visual insights, supporting stakeholder visibility and compliance reporting,' directly addressing configurability, customization, and compliance. REST APIs and SQL-based engines are mentioned for integration, and adherence to security standards is stated. However, no explicit examples or depth of configurability are given, slightly limiting full confidence.
ability: The ability to generate configurable and customizable reports to get insights into the data
